title: Beans on Toast
instructions:
Put the butter in your mouth, wait 2 seconds to allow slight melting. Then follow with the toast. Swish around for 10-15 seconds to allow even coating of butter on the toast. Then add the beans, slowly.
  
    Season to taste.

title: Beans on Arepa
instructions:
Spread the butter in your mouth, wait 2 seconds to allow slight melting. Then follow with the toast. Swish around for 10-15 seconds to allow even coating of butter on the toast. Then add the beans, slowly.
  
    Season to taste.
